page.title: 06INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: {INTERESTING PEOPLE} {Monsignor F D Crichton}was a Catholic parish priest of Pershore for 22 years. He has lived in Pershore for 30 years and is an internationally known author of books on the Catholic Liturgy. {Mr John Smith}known as{"Mr Pershore",} has twice been Mayor and was instumental in having the youngest Mayoress in Great Britain as his mayoral partner. He is a local poet and has written many poems on the beauty of Pershore. {Mr Atherton}invented a treatment for hayfever sufferers. It resembles a large goldfish bowl which fits over the head. The "humane" mousetrap was invented by a Pershore man. The mouse once caught may be released unharmed.
